text:
With all due respect, I 100% disagree with Mr Sameer M Dixit that PM & others politicians shd be the 1st ppl to get vaccinated

I think our Frontline workers shd be vaccinated 1st, followed by elderly or those with co-morbid conditions & then only others

#Vaccine #Nepal #COVID19 https://t.co/NkAaYSSBay
